title: 服务端报错
txt_content:
[00:12:03] [KCauldron version retrievier/WARN]: Error occured during retriving version
java.lang.Throwable
        at kcauldron.KLog.log(KLog.java:30) [KLog.class:1.7.10-1517.168]

replies.author: loveba_by
replies.txt_content: 噗  一看就知道了  核心你下载错了  建议更换核心核心处  不给最佳就捣乱233

replies.author: Innovators
replies.txt_content:
有三段错误.
1.检索版本时出错
2.检测更新错误
3.检测更新错误
解决就是升级KCauldron的版本,然后关闭自动更新检测{:10_523:}
